name: scandir
description: recursive directory scan with filtering features

scripts.pretest: jsrevival -p "describe, it" -o "properties: false, maxlen: 0, debug: false, bitwise: false, eqeq: false, newcap: false, unparam: false, vars: false, passfail: false" -r cli-hide-valid -R lib/ test/

author: sdolard@gmail.com
